meanings: (가난·구속 등에서) free (sb from sth), break away (from), rid oneself of
(요점·주제 등을) be off the point, be beside the point

phrases.phrase: 아직 그 충격에서 벗어날 수 없어요.
meanings: 감정 I still can't recover from the shock.

phrases.phrase: 여긴 참 평화롭군요. 도시의 시끄러움에서 벗어날 수 있어서 좋네요.
meanings: 공원 It's so peaceful here. It's nice to get away from the noise of the city.

meanings.meaning: there's no getting away from something
advise some means of escape from...

vlive.english: I will escape from the roundness. - Jadu!

vlive.english: If it's the right time, you can escape everything!

vlive.korean: [내기와 대결에서 벗어날 수 있는] 그런 게 없어. There isn't that. 듣기 View video 포토피플(PHOTO PEOPLE) : 포토피플 in TOKYO 11부_ep.5 열심히 일한 뽀삐즈~ 즐겨RA!! (ft 시부야 건물주느님)

examples.korean: This latest incident could derail the peace process. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이와 같은 최근의 사태로 인해 평화 정착 과정이 궤도를 벗어날 수도 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: This latest incident could derail the peace process. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She needed a break from routine. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 일상에서 벗어날 필요가 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She needed a break from routine. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: You need a break from routine. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 당신은 틀에 박힌 생활에서 벗어날 필요가 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You need a break from routine. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: There is no escape from the long arm of the law. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 법의 권한을 벗어날 수는 없다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: There is no escape from the long arm of the law. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He could see no way out of the situation. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 그 상황을 벗어날 수 있는 길을 알 수가 없었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He could see no way out of the situation. Add to Wordbook
